org.apache.lucene.index

Interface IndexReader.ClosedListener

  • Enclosing class:
    IndexReader
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface IndexReader.ClosedListener
    A listener that is called when a resource gets closed.
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.
Often called with MoreLikeThis, HighFreqTerms, FunctionScoreQuery, BooleanQuery, BoostQuery, MultiPhraseQuery, ConstantScoreQuery, SearcherManager, QueryScorer, IndexSearcher, MultiTermQuery, DirectoryReader, DirectSpellChecker, LeafReader, MultiReader, PhraseQuery, DisjunctionMaxQuery, Query, Term, Document, Terms, Fields, IndexWriter. Shall be called with SpellChecker, FragmentsBuilder, SpanNearClauseFactory, ToParentBlockJoinQuery, CachingNaiveBayesClassifier, SpanMultiTermQueryWrapper, QueryAutoStopWordAnalyzer, LuceneDictionary, MismatchedLeafReader, MismatchedDirectoryReader, AllDeletedFilterReader, ParallelCompositeReader, LongValueFacetCounts, OwnCacheKeyMultiReader, FieldFilterLeafReader, AssertingLeafReader, ScorerIndexSearcher.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClose(IndexReader.CacheKey key)
      Invoked when the resource (segment core, or index reader) that is being cached on is closed.

    • Method Detail

      • onClose

        void onClose(IndexReader.CacheKey key)
      throws IOException
        Invoked when the resource (segment core, or index reader) that is being cached on is closed.
        Throws:
        IOException
